named-native-query.name: UserEntity.existsByUsername
named-native-query.query: SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS( SELECT * FROM zapzup.user_entity WHERE username = :username AND status = 'ACTIVE' ) THEN true ELSE false END

named-native-query.name: UserEntity.existsByEmail
named-native-query.query: SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS( SELECT * FROM zapzup.user_entity WHERE email = :email AND status = 'ACTIVE' ) THEN true ELSE false END

named-native-query.name: UserEntity.findById
named-native-query.query: SELECT * FROM zapzup.user_entity WHERE id = :id AND status = 'ACTIVE'
